summary: Tired of dull gray dragons? 2nd mod by luddemann
descriptionHtml:
COLORFUL DRAGONS 3 IS OUT: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3740

Ok, I\'ve had another go at the dragons. I\'ve modified the dragons textures to make them more colorful and eye catching. 

Please endorse if you like it :) Those simple mouse presses is what keeps me going :P 
--If i get over 50 endorsments, ill make alternative textures for every dragon :D--

Installation: Extract to installation folder. 

Green/Red is Swamp dragon
Icyblue/pink is snow dragon
Yellow/Purple is earth dragon
Green/Gold is dragon boss
Orange/Turqoise is dragon
Pink/Gold is Odaviig

If you dont like some of the re textures, then you can go into the folder named actors and find the .dds files that you don\'t like and delete them. After that install as normal.

Changelog:
1.0.2 Made a new and better Alduin
1.0.1 Added parthurnax
author: Luddemann
